last_episode_to_air.name: Humble
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jesus refuses to look and act like the Messiah everyone expects—arriving like a lamb instead of a lion and riding a donkey instead of a war horse.

name: The Chosen
overview: The life of Christ through the eyes of those who encountered him called The Chosen.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A charismatic fisherman drowning in debt. A troubled woman wrestling with real demons. A gifted publican ostracized by his family and his people. A religious leader struggling with his beliefs. See Jesus through the eyes of those who met Him.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Tensions rise as Jesus and his disciples take the ministry on the road. With increased fame comes more redemption and healing, but also more enemies.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Jesus gives a sermon that turns the world upside down, and all 12 disciples are ready to follow him to the ends of the earth.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After preaching to a crowd of more than 5,000 people in Galilee and performing a miracle by walking on water, Jesus’ actions increasingly anger Jewish authorities.

episodes.name: I Have Called You by Name
episodes.overview: Two brothers struggle with their tax debts to Rome while a woman in the Red Quarter wrestles with her demons.

episodes.name: Shabbat
episodes.overview: Matthew validates Simon's claims with Praetor Quintus, Nicodemus investigates the miracle reported in the Red Quarter, and Mary receives surprise guests at her Shabbat dinner.

episodes.name: Jesus Loves the Little Children
episodes.overview: Jesus befriends and teaches the group of children who discover His camp on the outskirts of Capernaum.

episodes.name: The Rock on Which it is Built
episodes.overview: With his life and family under threat from Rome, Simon spends one last night fishing in a desperate attempt to square his debts. Andrew spots a familiar face waiting for them on the shores of Galilee.

episodes.name: The Wedding Gift
episodes.overview: Nicodemus interrogates John the Baptizer while Jesus and his students make their way to a wedding celebration in Cana. When the wine runs low, Mary asks her son to intervene on behalf of the bridegroom's family.

episodes.name: Indescribable Compassion
episodes.overview: After witnessing the healing of a leper on the road to Capernaum, a woman forces her paralytic friend through the crowd to meet Jesus.

episodes.name: Invitations
episodes.overview: Matthew struggles to reconcile the miracles he has witnessed with reality. Nicodemus meets with Jesus by night.

episodes.name: I Am He
episodes.overview: Jesus and His students complete their preparations and leave Capernaum for Samaria. Jesus meets with a suffering woman at Jacob's Well and announces that He is the Messiah.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A charismatic fisherman drowning in debt. A troubled woman wrestling with real demons. A gifted publican ostracized by his family and his people. A religious leader struggling with his beliefs. See Jesus through the eyes of those who met Him.

episodes.name: Thunder
episodes.overview: Tension builds among the disciples as they wrestle with the increasing fame of Jesus in Samaria. Jesus rebukes Big James and John for their prejudice and, after a near-violent encounter, gives them a new nickname.

episodes.name: I Saw You
episodes.overview: A mysterious visitor seeks to meet Jesus, but the disciples are hesitant. Tension builds between Simon and Matthew. As the group heads to a new city, word arrives that Jesus’ fame is growing.

episodes.name: Matthew 4:24
episodes.overview: A long, exhausting day turns into night as the disciples help Jesus deal with a large crowd hoping to be healed. Around the campfire, over dinner, the group tried to get to know each other better. But tensions erupt.

episodes.name: The Perfect Opportunity
episodes.overview: As Jesus and the disciples head to Jerusalem to celebrate the Feast of Tabernacles, a new enemy follows them, while a familiar enemy awaits.

episodes.name: Spirit
episodes.overview: After stirring the water, Jesus is now pursued by Simon the Zealot, Atticus, and Shmuel. John the Baptizer visits the group and tells Jesus his dangerous mission. Meanwhile, back at the camp, Mary Magdalene is devastated by an encounter with a mysterious and dangerous stranger.

episodes.name: Unlawful
episodes.overview: Matthew and Simon try to get along as they search for Mary in dark places. The group fears for Mary as they struggle with lack of food and bad news about John the Baptist. Meanwhile, Jesus continues to upset Pharisees across multiple regions.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: After learning of Jesus' whereabouts, Quintus sends Gaius to arrest him. The disciples lose control as they argue about how to respond. While seeking information about where Jesus has been taken, Andrew and Philip encounter old friends.

episodes.name: Beyond Mountains
episodes.overview: While Jesus and Matthew prepare the content of the big sermon, the disciples spread the word while fighting amongst themselves. A high-ranking Sanhedrin member is shocked by Shmuel’s reports on Jesus. Thousands arrive for the sermon, including familiar faces.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Tensions rise as Jesus and his disciples take the ministry on the road. With increased fame comes more redemption and healing, but also more enemies.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Jesus delivers the most life-altering sermon in history. The result? More followers, more enemies, and disciples ready to follow Jesus anywhere. Simon and Eden reunite, Matthew faces his past, and Andrew visits John the Baptist in prison.

episodes.name: Two by Two
episodes.overview: Jesus is a problem for the Romans. With pilgrims from everywhere setting up a tent city at the gates of Capernaum to see Jesus, tensions rise. Jesus officially sends the twelve apostles on an exciting but dangerous mission, causing Little James to ask why he hasn’t been healed.

episodes.name: Physician, Heal Yourself
episodes.overview: Jesus returns to his childhood home for the big Jewish new year celebration. His childhood friends and family are all buzzing with what they’ve heard about Jesus…until he tells them the truth of who He is.

episodes.name: Clean, Part 1
episodes.overview: Two by two, the disciples carry out Jesus’ mission to heal, cast out demons, and preach his  words. But upon returning, they struggle with understanding what happened while Simon and  Eden struggle to reconnect.

episodes.name: Clean, Part 2
episodes.overview: As tensions mount at home, Simon and Gaius work together to fix the water problem in Capernaum. Meanwhile, Jairus and Veronica are equally desperate to find Jesus as the only hope for their crises.

episodes.name: Intensity in Tent City
episodes.overview: Andrew and Philip discover their previous mission resulted in devastation that will require a return. Simon Z is finally forced to confront his past, but then two disciples of John the Baptist come to Capernaum with an important question for Jesus.

episodes.name: Ears to Hear
episodes.overview: "Having ears to hear." Jesus leads the disciples into a dangerous region, where they will face a crowd armed with sharp tongues and dull ears… but even his closest followers are finding it very hard to hear.

episodes.name: Sustenance
episodes.overview: Thousands arrive to first argue with, then listen to Jesus as he preaches. Shmuel and Atticus hear what’s happening and journey towards the Decapolis to catch Jesus in the act of a possible revolt. Meanwhile, as the preaching extends to the next day, the disciples realize they have a significant problem: the thousands are hungry, and there’s no food.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Jesus gives a sermon that turns the world upside down, and all 12 disciples are ready to follow him to the ends of the earth.

episodes.name: Promises
episodes.overview: An intoxicating dance leads Herod to put an end to John the Baptizer, but no one can stop what-or Who-he's ushered in.

episodes.name: Confessions
episodes.overview: Jesus founds his church on unholy ground and Simon goes public with Jesus' true identity, getting a new name in the process. But can the new "Peter" forgive old wrongs?

episodes.name: Moon to Blood
episodes.overview: When Jesus heals a blind man on the Sabbath, religious leaders confront him, drawing a riotous crowd. Gaius defies a direct order leading Quintus to take matters—and someone’s life—into his own hands.

episodes.name: Calm Before
episodes.overview: Beginning with a funeral procession, time marches rapidly toward the final days of Jesus’ ministry. While the disciples seek status for themselves, a Roman ruler comes with a humble request.

episodes.name: Sitting, Serving, Scheming
episodes.overview: Roman soldiers demand the disciples carry their armor, but Jesus goes one step farther. Frustrated by the direction of Jesus’ ministry, Judas visits an old friend for advice.

episodes.name: Dedication
episodes.overview: Jesus and the disciples celebrate Hanukkah. Matthew confronts Judas about irregularities, and the festival turns into a fight, then flight. The disciples escape with their lives, but learn a friend hasn’t been so lucky.

episodes.name: The Last Sign
episodes.overview: Jesus brings Lazarus back to life—and sets off the chain of events that will lead to His own death.

episodes.name: Humble
episodes.overview: Jesus refuses to look and act like the Messiah everyone expects—arriving like a lamb instead of a lion and riding a donkey instead of a war horse.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: After preaching to a crowd of more than 5,000 people in Galilee and performing a miracle by walking on water, Jesus’ actions increasingly anger Jewish authorities.
